Question & Options:
Who composed the soundtrack for the 2022 film 'Kantara'?
Options:
A. A. A.R. Rahman
B. B. B. Ajaneesh Loknath
C. C. Hans Zimmer
D. D. John Williams

In the 2022 movie 'Kantara', how many musicians were brought in to work on the music alongside B. Ajaneesh Loknath?
Options:
A. 10–20 musicians
B. 20–30 musicians
C. 30–40 musicians
D. 40–50 musicians

In the 2022 movie 'Kantara', who assisted the team behind the music with Jaanapada songs and traditional instruments?
Options:
A. Mime Ramdas
B. A.R. Rahman
C. Ilaiyaraaja
D. Shankar-Ehsaan-Loy

In the 2022 movie 'Kantara', which song was alleged to have been plagiarized from 'Navarasam' by Thaikkudam Bridge?
Options:
A. Varaha Roopam
B. Navarasam
C. Kantara Theme
D. Dance of the Forest

In the 2022 movie 'Kantara', what significant change was made to the song 'Varaha Roopam' when it was released on Amazon Prime?
Options:
A. The lyrics were completely rewritten
B. It was performed live by the cast
C. It was modified with a new orchestral arrangement
D. It was replaced by a different song
Correct Answer: It was modified with a new orchestral arrangement
